娷字的基本解释

娷
zhuì
推委。
饥声。

娷
shuì
古女子人名用字。
姓。

娷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuì］
［《廣韻》竹恚切，去寘，知。］
(1)同“諈”。
(2)饥声。
[②]［shuì］
［《集韻》樹僞切，去寘，禪。］
(1)女子名用字。
(2)姓。

娷字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　娷； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页263第32
【廣韻】【集韻】?竹恚切，音諈。【說文】諈諉，累也。【註】以事相屬也。　又姓。　又人名。【前漢·藝文志】兵家有娷一篇。　又【集韻】樹僞切，音瑞。女字。　又馳僞切，音腄。又是爲切，音垂。義?同。

娷字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
娷字的起名意思

古女子人名用字。

娷
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhuì］
["Guangyun" Bamboo Jun cut, go to place, know. ]
(1) Same as "諈".
(2) The sound of hunger.
[②]［shuì］
["Ji Yun" tree pseudo-cut, go to set, Zen. ]
(1) Words used in women's names.
(2) Last name.
娷
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　娷; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 263 32
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Bamboo Yun cut, sound flick. [Said the text] You are tired and tired. 【Note】According to things.　Another last name.　Another name. [Previous Han·Art and Literature History] There is an article in the military strategist.　[Jiyun] Tree pseudo-cut, sound Rui. Female characters.　Fake and cut again, sound awkward. It's cut again, and sound is vertical. Righteous? Same.
